item.title: Simple Smartphone Video Task for Native Polish Speakers - Upwork
item.description:
Hi! Do you speak Polish and have a smartphone? We're looking for you to join a fun project. Your task is simple: create a short, engaging video in Polish using your phone's camera.

Here's what you'll do:
- Record a lively 15 to 30-second selfie video with your phone held vertically
- Follow the provided script
- Show your energy and enthusiasm

No special skills or experience needed, just be yourself! This opportunity is for native Polish speakers who love to showcase their creativity. Ready for some fun? Join us now!

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 18, 2024 22:09 UTC
Category: Acting
Skills:Acting, Polish, UGC, Smartphone, Android, iOS, Camera
Skills: Acting, Polish, UGC, Smartphone, Android, iOS, Camera
Country: Poland

item.title: Hiring A Youtube Thumbnail Designer (20+) - Upwork
item.description:
Hello! We are hiring a Thumbnail Designer for our YouTube Channel. This job will require you to do the following:

-  Create An Engaging Thumbnail For Our Videos  

-  Create 4-7 Thumbnails Per Week

-  Be able to replicate the quality of thumbnails from the examples below. Please be OK with GRAPHIC Content.

https://youtu.be/RuKpethtK5U?si=NP21RnKJVHA2wq_p


Please check out some of the videos on these channels to verify you can match the quality of the Thumbnails, the color matching, the graphic content style as well for what we are looking for before applying for this job and

We are paying $20+ per Thumbnail for this job, so we are looking for a well-seasoned Thumbnail Designer who has experience with making these styles of Thumbnails. We are looking to hire someone who can make consistent Thumbnails per month for our channel. if you have read through this entire job post please begin your cover letter with the word "purple". All other applicants will be excluded.

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 18, 2024 22:06 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Photo Editing, YouTube, Adobe Illustrator
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Photo Editing, YouTube, Adobe Illustrator
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: VSL Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented individual to create engaging and professional-looking VSL (Video Sales Letter) for our business. The ideal candidate should possess exceptional creativity and video editing skills to produce high-quality content that captivates our target audience. As a VSL Creator, you will be responsible for conceptualizing ideas, developing scripts, selecting visuals, and editing footage to deliver persuasive and compelling messages. The ability to effectively communicate product features and benefits through visual storytelling is crucial. If you are a creative genius with a passion for video editing, we want to hear from you!

Skills required:

- Creativity
- Video editing

item.title: Motion Graphics Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a brilliant motion graphic designer for an ongoing remote position in our Agency. Our ideal candidate is fluent in After Effects, and quick enough to turn around 2 drafts of a 30s video every day. If we like your work, we will request 2 videos every week at $50 per video.

To apply for this role, please review the request doc and then share some example works for us. We will hire you based on any references and examples shared from the screening questions/messages. We will hire you at $25 video editing test (as we plan on hiring many editors to test) and the best candidate with fewest amount of notes/feedback will be selected.

item.title: Video Editor for Instagram Reels and Meme-Inspired Content - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a reliable and skilled video editor to handle our content for Instagram. The role involves editing primarily short-form content for Instagram Reels, with videos typically under 180 seconds, as well as creating short, meme-inspired videos that align with our brand identity.

The ideal candidate will have experience in short-form content editing, understanding the dynamics of Instagram Reels and meme-inspired content. Familiarity with Capcut or similar editing tools is a plus.

**Responsibilities:**

- Edit raw video content to create engaging Instagram Reels
- Create short, meme-inspired videos that align with our brand identity
- Work closely with our team to understand the brand's aesthetic and messaging
- Deliver high-quality video content under tight deadlines

**Requirements:**

- Proven experience as a video editor
- Strong understanding of Instagram Reels and meme-inspired content
- Proficient in video editing software such as Capcut
- Strong sense of aesthetics and attention to detail
- Ability to adhere to brand guidelines and maintain a consistent style across videos
- Excellent communication skills and ability to take direction well

To apply, please provide a portfolio or examples of your previous work, particularly Instagram Reels or meme-inspired video content.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 21:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.description:
Culo, an eco-friendly brand specializing in luxurious bamboo underwear, is seeking a talented videographer to capture an exciting flash mob event in London (Marble Arch Station - Leicester Square via Regents St & Piccadilly Circus). You will film 200 participants proudly walking through the city in our sustainable underwear, creating engaging footage that showcases our commitment to style, comfort, and the environment. If you’re creative, passionate about sustainability, and have a knack for dynamic storytelling, we’d love to see your work!

item.title: CASHCOW TEAM Needed LONG TERM To Make High Quality (Faceless Videos) Money-Making Online Content - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a full production team with script writers and video editors focused on developing engaging, high-quality videos in the "make money online" niche. Our mission is to provide value-packed content that educates and motivates our audience to leverage the internet for financial success.  We are expanding our team to include talented individuals who can innovate and grow with us in the digital space.

**Job Description:**
We are looking for a talented team who specializes in writing scripts and editing faceless videos for the make money online niche. The ideal candidate will possess a deep understanding of YouTube's platform, including trends and analytics, and be adept at producing high-quality content that does not feature on-camera talent. Your role will involve heavy editing, including the integration of engaging images, animations, and clips to convey messages effectively and engagingly.

**Responsibilities:**
- Create and edit faceless videos that are engaging and informative, focusing on the "make money online" niche.
- Research and implement the most effective editing techniques to ensure content is visually appealing.
- Innovate and recreate content based on existing popular formats from specified YouTube channels.
- Collaborate with the content team to plan and execute video projects.
- Manage multiple projects from conception through to final delivery, ensuring all videos meet the quality standards and are delivered on schedule.
- Analyze performance data to improve video strategies and increase viewer engagement and retention.

**Requirements:**
- Proven experience as a Video Editor or similar role with a portfolio showcasing your ability to produce engaging digital content.
- Strong expertise in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, After Effects, etc.).
- Excellent understanding of YouTube's platform, including SEO, analytics, and content optimization.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to meet deadlines in a remote setting.
- Creative thinker with the ability to adapt and recreate any requested video in an original and engaging manner.
- Experience creating faceless videos is highly preferred.

**Do Not Apply If:**
- You do not have a portfolio that includes relevant video production or editing work.
- You lack experience in YouTube content creation and optimization.

Budget for entire project is $10,000 and will increase depending on the success of the project. Provide your lowest flat rate bid for 8 to 15 minute. We will only take those with the lowest bids. Keep in mind this project is long term work.

This is the example of the editing style in this youtube channel link: We will further discuss the script style but you must have a great understanding of youtube and the make money online niche.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eK0S3LPU0L0

To apply, please provide your lowest flat rate bid per video. Keep in mind this project is for long term work. If your bid is too high, we will hire other candidates.



Budget: $10,000
Posted On: June 18, 2024 21:16 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Content Writing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Content Writing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply
